issue.title: [Python] Improving Classes and Methods Docstrings - Streams and File access
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16331](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16331). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Continuation of the initiative aimed at improving methods and classes docstrings, especially from the point of view of ensuring they have an `Examples` section.

Covered topic: Streams and File access
